attributes.action: Call for a referendum for the UK to become part of the United States of America.
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to allow a referendum to the citizens of the United Kingdom.
attributes.background: To call for a referendum for the uk to become part of the United States of America. The people of the UK and the USA speak the same language and are extremely similar in beliefs and values. So why don't we make our special relationship a more permanent and meaningful fixture.

rejection.details: Joining of the United States of America would be a matter for the US Congress to decide, and not something the UK Government or Parliament could unilterally do.
